h1_title: Best Settings on PS5 and PC
content: However, with all that said, simply turning Ray Tracing off will give you a more stable performance and the game still looks quite good as you’ll still have the fantastic ssr that Game Science has implemented instead while maintaining performance.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Best_Settings_on_PS5_and_PC.md', within the main section titled 'Best Settings on PS5 and PC'.
The content is as follows:
However, with all that said, simply turning Ray Tracing off will give you a more stable performance and the game still looks quite good as you’ll still have the fantastic ssr that Game Science has implemented instead while maintaining performance.
